enhanced_description: Zigtal is a comprehensive Skill Intelligence Platform designed to enable and foster a Skill-Based Organization. It provides a seamless, unbiased, and skills-driven experience for both employees and business leaders, whether an organization is transitioning to or already operating as skill-based. The platform offers critical functionalities such as contextual views of employee skills (Skills Insight), clarity on business demands and industry skills trends (Demand Clarity), and tools to strategically bridge skill gaps through training, nurturing, and hiring. Key features include an Internal Skills Marketplace that empowers employees with AI-recommended learning, mentorship, gigs, and jobs aligned with their skills and goals, alongside Skill-paths for structured employee upskilling tailored to aspirations and business needs, and a Leadership Lounge for direct connection between leaders and employees.

Accelerating employee skill development and learning efficiency
Aligning organizational skill strategy with business goals
Strategic workforce planning based on skill demands
Facilitating internal talent mobility through AI-recommended opportunities (learning, mentorship, gigs, jobs)
Guiding employee upskilling and career development through skill-paths
Connecting leaders and employees around skill development initiatives
